title: Computers Judge What Makes The Perfect Radio Voice
teaser: A few weeks ago, All Tech Considered asked the audience to send voice samples to analyze. Those samples were put through an algorithm to figure out what kind of voice would make an appealing radio host. NPR's Audie Cornish explains how this experiment turned out.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
